actual_description: Users should be able to block any card using online banking systems.
The system should check the card status when the user blocks the desired card.

After the user completes the card-blocking process, the system should immediately block the related card, and no one should be able to use that card in ATMs, shopping, online shopping,  If a blocked card is used for anything, the system should inform the banking staff and cardholder.
It should be added after the 'My Cards' page.
The system should check the card status when the user blocks the desired card.
The blocking reasons can be stolen, missing, and others.
Customer  Users can have four types of cards: debit, credit, virtual and supplementary.
If the user does not enter this area field as input, the system should not let the user block their card.
Menu Placement  The 'Block Card' process should be under the 'Cards' menu.
During the card-blocking process, the system should ask for the reason for the blocking.
Users should be able to block any card using online banking systems.
If the user selects 'other' as the reason, the system should ask for further explanation in a free-text area.
The user can initiate the card-blocking process if the card status is available.
The system should display three different kinds of blocking reasons for the user.
